Name: Siberian Run VR
About the game: Survival-adventure VR game with the history in the background. We have to run away from Siberia. During World War II, the Russians deported by trains several hundred thousand people from Eastern Europe, including Poland to Siberia for work camps. You play as one of the displaced people. Our task is to escape from the train and survive in the Siberian taiga in Virtual Reality.
